info.name: autohide the menu & sidebar [Globe and Mail]
info.description: Hides The Globe and Mail's header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.)
info.additionalInfo: The thin vertical bars at the left edge of the screen are the collapsed headers and sidebar. (Yes, "headers" - there are several of them, with no common container that doesn't include everything else, too.) Mouse over them to restore the element.
